Posts.Content: Ellenida wrote: I had a wide excision for a complicated lump - pathologists all confused. they sought several opinions which said my lump was a "challenging case".  Thankfully I am just on surveillance mammos now, very low grade DCIS, but the opinion was that it was vital it had all been removed.  The op was done by a young registrar & so when I see my consultant who says it has all gone I find it difficult to believe her. She can't know can she? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Not confident in treatment Ellenida Ellenida
